description: Try our easy to follow Roast Vegetables With Green Leaf Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Roast Vegetables With Green Leaf Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a roasting pan with baking paper. Cut 750g kent pumpkin into 4 wedges. Slice 2 zucchini into 2cmthick rounds, and deseed and quarter 2 red capsicums. Combine in pan with 200g sliced halloumi. Drizzle over 2 tbs olive oil and season. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden brown and tender. Dollop with 3/4 cup Green leaf pesto (see recipe) and top with basil leaves, to serve.
